document.full_text: disgraced 2004 olympic 100 meters champion justin gatlin's comeback bid gained new life on wednesday when he was invited to compete in saturday's prefontaine classic diamond league meeting.
document.title: gatlin gets comeback chance in oregon
lines_and_colors: disgraced 2004 olympic 100 meters champion justin gatlin's comeback bid gained new life on wednesday when he was invited to compete in saturday's prefontaine classic diamond league meeting.
